

Introduction
------------
This is a Django Fullstack Project and it features a website to order coffee in a coffee shop in tehran city. 
It uses django version 4.2.3 to bring all the new features into the code. We used all the knowledge we gained 
from Django to code a website for the manager, who ordered this website. so Welcome to our humble coffee shop 
where we serve the finest coffee and cafe drinks in the world.


**Powered By Django**
